scripts.build: rm -rf public/js && mkdir -p public/js/{core,components,services,utils,config} && cp src/core/MetricsCalculator.js public/js/core/ && cp src/core/workspace-graph.js public/js/core/ && cp src/core/graph-visualizer.js public/js/core/ && cp src/components/MetricsDisplay.js public/js/components/ && cp -r src/services/* public/js/services/ && cp -r src/utils/* public/js/utils/ && cp -r src/config/* public/js/config/
